content: this legal text summarizes a court case that took place in messina and lasted for 4 years the parties involved were identified as ra rs rr and rf the court ruled in favor of rr and awarded them ownership of a property in stromboli ordering ar to pay damages ar objected to the statute of limitations and claimed usucaption but the court rejected these arguments the case was remanded for further investigation and additional parties joined ultimately the court assigned the disputed property to ar with a charge in favor of the coheirs an appeal was filed by rr and fr and more parties joined the court declared certain individuals absentia and held that the property should be divided among the coheirs with ar receiving a larger share the court discussed the interpretation of article 720 of the civil code and determined that the allocation of the property should be based on the interests of the parties involved the court ordered equalization payments to the other coheirs and addressed claims for reimbursement of expenses and damages the appeal was partially accepted and the costs were offset the court of appeals in messina heard from the attorneys representing the parties and declared certain individuals in contempt of court the court made a final ruling on an appeal partially accepting it and awarding ownership of the property in stromboli to certain individuals based on their respective shares these individuals were also ordered to pay a sum of money to the heirs of another individual along with legal interest the court declared that the costs of the case would be compensated the decision was made on january 4 2005 by the president of the court
